Package ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.database

Class EventPosterImageHandler

java.lang.Object
ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.database.BaseImageHandler
ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.database.EventPosterImageHandler
public class EventPosterImageHandler extends BaseImageHandler
The EventPosterImageHandler class extends the BaseImageHandler class and provides methods to upload, retrieve, and remove event poster images from Firebase Storage.

  • Method Details

    • uploadPoster

      public void uploadPoster(android.net.Uri file, Event event)
      Uploads a poster image for an event.
      Parameters:
      file - The URI of the image file to be uploaded.
      event - The event object for which the poster image is being uploaded.

    • getPosterPicture

      public void getPosterPicture(Event event, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
      Retrieves the poster picture for an event and sets it to the provided ImageView.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object for which the poster picture is being retrieved.
      imageView - The ImageView where the poster picture will be set.

    • removeEventPoster

      public void removeEventPoster(Event event)
      Removes the event poster image for the given event. If the event does not have a poster image, nothing is done.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object for which the poster image is being removed.
